defaultRecipes.name: Acai Smoothie Bowl
defaultRecipes.description: Acai bowls make a great breakfast and giving you two of your five a day
steps: Combine acai pulp, 2/3 of the banana, and 2 tablespoons of soy milk in a blender.
Blend until smooth, but still thick.
Smoothie should have the consistency of frozen yogurt

defaultRecipes.name: Rainbow Power Greens Salad with Black Eyed Peas
defaultRecipes.description: A healthy gluten free power greens salad packed with lucky black eyed peas and super nutrients.  A great way to start off the new year and get back on track with clean eating. Easy to make and full of flavor!
steps: Rinse your chopped greens and add cabage in a medium pan.
